entries.name: RAND_CHARS
entries.desc: Characters used to generate random strings

entries.name: create_listeners(address, port)
entries.desc: Creates TCP server sockets bound to address:port and returns them.

entries.name: create_self_signed_cert(bits, cn, comment)
entries.desc: Creates a self-signed certificate with the given number of bits, the issuer cn and a comment to be stored in the certificate.

entries.name: random_string(len)
entries.desc: Generates a random string of length len

entries.name: set_close_on_exec(io)
entries.desc: Sets the close on exec flag for io

entries.name: set_non_blocking(io)
entries.desc: Sets IO operations on io to be non-blocking

entries.name: su(user)
entries.desc: Changes the process's uid and gid to the ones of user
